title: The Devil is Afraid of Me - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/13/20
itunes:title: The Devil is Afraid of Me - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/13/20
description:
George Noory and author Michael Lichens discuss the career of the late Father Gabriele Amorth, who conducted over 60,000 exorcisms for the Catholic Church, how demons can possess innocent people and what they want to achieve.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
